body.content:
My Greetings to you and your family my dear,
I am Mrs. Deborah Machefer I have a donation of (6.900.000.00 USD) MILLION
for you. Please i will like you to get back to me if you will help on this
donation to help the poor. I will give you more details on how you can help
to invest this money to help the poor because of my poor health condition
which I will let you know as soon as I hear from you. Reply for more
details & information.
God bless you as I wait for your reply.
Your sister.
Mrs. Deborah Machefer.
